snippet: The 12-year-old girls are accused of stabbing their friend to please a demonlike creature named Slenderman that they learned about on a website, according to court documents.
abstract: Two 12-year-old girls in Wisconsin are accused of stabbing their friend nearly to death in the woods to please a fictional character Slenderman, demonlike creature they learned about through a horror website; both girls are charged as adults with first-degree attempted homicide.
lead_paragraph: The 12-year-old girls are accused of stabbing their friend to please a demonlike creature named Slenderman that they learned about on a website, according to court documents.

headline.main: Wisconsin: 2 Girls Accused of Stabbing Friend 19 Times
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin: 2 Girls Accused of Stabbing Friend
